method.name: RequestInstalledProfiles
method.tp:docstring: Reload the profiles installed on a eUICC.

method.name: InstallProfileFromActivationCode
method.tp:docstring: Install a profile onto the eUICC using an activation code.

arg.name: activation_code
arg.tp:docstring: Activation code of the profile to install.

arg.name: confirmation_code
arg.tp:docstring: Confirmation code of the profile to install, or "" if none.

arg.name: profile
arg.tp:docstring: Profile object representing the newly-installed profile.

method.name: InstallPendingProfile
method.tp:docstring: Install a profile onto the eUICC using a pending Profile from SM-DS.

arg.name: confirmation_code
arg.tp:docstring: Confirmation code of the profile to install, or "" if none.

arg.name: profile
arg.tp:docstring: Profile object representing the newly-installed profile. Same as the input "pending_profile"

method.name: UninstallProfile
method.tp:docstring: Uninstall a profile from the eUICC.

arg.name: profile
arg.tp:docstring: D-Bus path of the Profile object to uninstall.

method.name: RequestPendingProfiles
method.tp:docstring: Request Events/Profiles from SM-DS. Will update the PendingProfiles property as needed prior to returning.

method.name: SetTestMode
method.tp:docstring: Set/unset test mode. If set to true, the LPA will list test profiles and allow operations on them.

method.name: UseTestCerts
method.tp:docstring: Set to true if downloading profiles from an SMDX with a test certificate. Use this method to download profiles to an esim from a test CI.

method.name: ResetMemory
method.tp:docstring: "reset_options" can take two values as defined in SGP.22 1 - deleteOperationalProfiles 2 - deleteFieldLoadedTestProfiles
